post.body: Looked for you on Facebook. Can't find you. Please add me as your friend - Chad Payne West Blocton, AL.
I know. It's like people who gripe about Mac users, but never used a Mac. Once you go Mac, you never go back.
your post re plans was well written. Good on you for being upfront about rumors, etc. Praying for you during this transition.
G'nite Scott. Thanks for representing God's loving presence to that family today. Ya did good, bro.
Holy Smokes, Anne! That movie changed my life. Banzai!!!
sorry to hear about the accident. Thank God your wife is okay.
go blame, go! You go, boyeeee!
oh yeah. It was bad. Go rent dark knight to clear your mind. Worked for me!
Merry Christmas to you!
all your talk of exercise is convicting me. Hitting the treadmill now.
If you'll send me a copy, I'll be happy to send a picture of me posing with it. :-)
About to read some more of Honor Harrington: At All Costs. Great story!
Preparing for tonight. Speaking on carnal vs. spiritual Christians: 1 Cor 3. Looks like rain, so probably on spiritual ones will show up.
Welcome @sewciopath, my lovely bride, to the world of twitter!
Just updated the church website. Check it: http://www.nlag.cc
Ah. That nap was delicious!
Outreach went great today. Now my couch calls me for a nap.
Power out this morning. Not stopping me from this morning's outreach! We're sharing love, Jesus style! Pray for us! Feeding 50 families!
Putting up Xmas tree. Wasp inside it woke when brought inside. Girls went screaming. Killed it manly fashion. Merry Xmas you filthy insect.
At the library with the fam. I feel so intelligent in the midst of all these books.
C'mon.... Snow. Snow! SNOW!!
My 3 yr old is spinning in circles saying "I just wuv cwismas, daddy!". How cute is that?
Got a butt chewing from a church member last night for something I didn't do. Count it all joy!
Waiting in line at Target for second row checkout when first row opens beside us. Second in line. Yeah. Favor of the Lord, people.
Last minute shopping for gifts and groceries at Target. Chick fil a beforehand makes it okay.
Home from the office. We are closing the church offices until after New Years. Maxin' and relaxin' for the holidays.... Life is good!
Just finished a Logan's steak with the church staff. Now off to starbucks for a latte!
Wrapping Christmas presents. Finally done.
Headed to church. Wearing coat & tie today. Don't faint. Got my Looney Tunes Christmas tie! Hard to take one seriously wearing Bugs Bunny.
Time to exercise again. Got twenty pounds to lose and a heart to strengthen! Can't afford a trainer, so y'all cheer me on.
About to go eat Mexican food. But what I really want is cheesecake. Yeah. For supper.
Getting started on New Years resolution early. Exercising to be less of the man I am (poundage-wise anyway).
Kim is feeling better today. She can be mom today, and I'll go back to being "pastor." My job is much easier than hers...
Been playing "mom" today since Kim is sick. Washed clothes, dishes, bottoms. Cleaned kitchen and living room. Moms deserve better pay!!
My lovely wife, Kim, is very sick this morning. Stomach bug - she's been up ALL NIGHT throwing up.
